attributes.action: Legislate spectrum released by analogue TV closedown switched to HDTV Freeview
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given people are replacing their old [CRT] televisions with HDTV it is reasonable they receive all Freeview broadcasts in High Definition; the spectrum is in fact 'owned' by the people. As with monochrome [b/w] televisions, people eaking-out the final years of obsolete analogue TVs may do so with a Freeview box [as is government policy anyway].

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Legislate spectrum released by analogue TV closedown switched to HDTV Freeview."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
